attributes.action: The Govt to immediately end COVID 19 Lock Down except for people at higher risk.
attributes.additional_details:
The Govt existing strategy for everyone to Stay at Home cannot work because once the Lock Down rules are finally removed the COVID 19 Virus is still out there & the death cycle will start over again.
It is a proven medical fact that those with weakened immune system are most susceptible to dying from this virus. The current containment & frightening of Society is only making this far worse for many otherwise fit & healthy individuals who then in turn cannot help and support the most vulnerable
attributes.background:
The Govt must immediately end the COVID 19 Lock Down except for people deemed at most risk by the NHS guidelines.
Society cannot help it's most vulnerable members nor indeed function properly by being locked up and in isolation.
There is no other plausible long term exit strategy open to the Govt.
